meanings.definition: To appear or project from a surface, as a rock formation.
meanings.sent1: The rocky cliff outcropped above the trees.
meanings.sent2: The ancient fossils outcropped in the desert landscape.
meanings.sent3: The curious squirrel outcropped from behind the bush.
meanings.sent4: Her talent for painting outcropped in the midst of the art class.
meanings.sent5: The bright red poppies outcropped against the green meadow.

meanings.definition: To emerge or come to the surface.
meanings.sent1: The sun outcropped from behind the clouds.
meanings.sent2: The truth eventually outcropped in the investigation.
meanings.sent3: The idea outcropped during the brainstorming session.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter outcropped amidst the serious meeting.
meanings.sent5: The stars outcropped in the night sky, twinkling brightly.
